name: Update old Unread RF message
command: [select count(*) cnt from mtfmsg_delv where rcvflg = 0 and rcvdte is null and insdte < (sysdate - (0.5 / 24))] | if (@cnt > 1){[update mtfmsg_delv set rcvflg = 1, rcvdte = sysdate where rcvflg = 0 and rcvdte is null and insdte < (sysdate - (0.5 / 24))] catch(@?)} else { sl_do nothing }
